pkgmetadata.longdescription: Single- And Multiple-Group Penalized Factor Analysis // Fits single- and multiple-group penalized factor analysis models via a trust-region algorithm with integrated automatic multiple tuning parameter selection (Geminiani et al., 2021 doi:10.1007/s11336-021-09751-8). Available penalties include lasso, adaptive lasso, scad, mcp, and ridge.
